stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Compromised Websites Redirect to System Profiling URLs
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: As recent as January 2015, users who visited www.iraqiembassy.us, www.embassyofafghanistan.org, and www.textronsystems.com were redirected to malicious URLs. Upon redirect, the systems were profiled using an unknown kit.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
Visiting www.iraqiembassy.us redirected to this URL. This redirect resulted in system profiling.
The variables observed were as follows. (The % represents some value that was collected such as version number): http://192.52.166.229/market/search.php?sid=%&fid=%&aid=%&mid=%&jaid=%&rid=http%

Visiting www.textronsystems.com or www.embassyofafghanistan.org throughout January 2015 redirected systems to http://blog.mobilemarketcenter.com/wp-admin/elib.php?cart_id=33. This redirect resulted in the system being profiled. At the time of reporting this domain resolved to the IP address 208.113.162.233.
